name: Dinos Playing Basketball
description:
A game about dinos playing basketball. A physics-based game made in Game Creator Progammer course at Yrgo.

The game is a little cropped, to fix this enter fullscreen mode!

Controls:

Player 1:
Move with A and D
Jump with W
Kick with E (only on ground)

Player2:
Move with left and right arrowkeys
Jump with up arrowkey
Kick with Shift

Since there might be confusion, kicking bounces the ball. Useful for if its stuck in a corner but could also be used to more easily score if the ball is under the hoop.

Credits:

Programming all done by me.

Art Credits:
Dinosaurs by Arks
Tilemap by GrafXKid
All other art used with permission

Music:
Background music by Tallbeard
Sound effects made with Bfxr
